pricing.question2: How do I change my plan later?
pricing.answer2: You can change your plan anytime from the settings page. Just select a new plan and confirm your choice.
pricing.question3: What kind of support is included?
pricing.answer3: All plans include email support. Higher-tier plans include priority support with faster response times.
